builds.name: Spider
builds.description: A walking robot with 4 legs that moves like a spider

lessons.title: Spider advance
lessons.objective: Learn how to use MakeCode graphical programming to make the building block Spider keep moving forward.

motorWiring.description: Connect the motors to the Super:bit expansion board
motorWiring.left: M1 interface (black line close to battery side)
motorWiring.right: M3 interface (black line close to battery side)

code.description: The program makes the Spider walk forward continuously

lessons.phenomenon: After the program is downloaded, the micro:bit dot matrix will display a heart. Turn on the power switch, and the Spider will keep moving forward.

lessons.title: The dancing spider
lessons.objective: Program the Spider to perform a dance routine by alternating motor movements.

code.description: Alternating motor patterns create a dancing motion

lessons.phenomenon: The Spider will dance by moving its legs in alternating patterns.

lessons.title: APP control
lessons.objective: Control the Spider using the Yahboom mobile app via Bluetooth.

motorWiring.description: Same motor wiring as previous lessons

code.onData: Parse commands and set motor speeds accordingly

lessons.phenomenon: Use the Yahboom app to control Spider movement via Bluetooth.

lessons.title: Micro:bit handle control
lessons.objective: Use a second micro:bit as a wireless controller for the Spider.

motorWiring.description: Same motor wiring, plus second micro:bit as controller

code.description: Radio signals from controller micro:bit control the Spider
code.spider: Receive radio data and control motors

lessons.phenomenon: Tilt or press buttons on the controller micro:bit to move the Spider.

lessons.title: WiFi camera control
lessons.objective: Add a WiFi camera module for remote viewing and control.

motorWiring.description: Motors plus WiFi camera module connection
motorWiring.camera: Connect WiFi camera to designated port

code.description: WiFi commands from camera app control the Spider
code.onCommand: Parse WiFi commands and control motors

lessons.phenomenon: View live camera feed and control Spider movement remotely.

lessons.title: Spider advance
lessons.objective: Program the Spider to move forward using Python.
lessons.code:
from microbit import *
import superbit

while True:
    superbit.motor_M1(-255)
    superbit.motor_M3(-255)

lessons.title: The dancing spider
lessons.objective: Create a dancing routine with Python.
lessons.code:
from microbit import *
import superbit
import time

while True:
    superbit.motor_M1(200)
    time.sleep(0.5)
    superbit.motor_M1(-200)
    time.sleep(0.5)

lessons.title: Micro:bit handle control
lessons.objective: Use radio to control Spider with Python.
lessons.code:
from microbit import *
import radio
import superbit

radio.on()
while True:
    msg = radio.receive()
    if msg:
        # Parse and control motors
